issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.summary: Mac: Appcelerator Studio freezes with the latest JDK 8u151 or JDK 8u152

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

fields.description:
When I launch AppC studio by double clicking on the icon in my applications dir, it gets as far as asking me about my workspace path but I can't click on any of the buttons or the path so I literally have to force quit it. 

I've restarted and re-launched same problem.

comments.body: Hello, Try logging in through terminal/command prompt. CLose studio, and in terminal/command prompt type "appc login" and follow through. After the process is done. Try opening studio. If the error still persists, Please run "appc ti setup check" and send the log in here. Thanks.
